data.title: Alzheimer's / Dementia Care
data.meta_description: IntegraCare is a trusted leader in senior living with 10+ communities offering assisted living, independent living, Alzheimer's care, and dementia care.
data.text:
Assisted Living /

Personal Care

Residents and family members can have total peace of mind knowing that 24/7 personal care is provided to each of our residents.

Learn More

Independent Living

We offer each resident the opportunity to live life without the worries and hassles of home ownership with the added benefit of assistance, when needed.

Learn More

Short Term /

Respite Care

Whether providing relief for a caregiver, temporary post-surgery rehabilitation or a trial stay for prospective residents, we're here to provide the care you need.

Learn More

Family Member Testimonial

We have two loved ones at Newhaven Court at Clearview... Everyone has stepped up to make his transition as wrinkle free as possible. There are just too many to name... you have a lot of people that pull more than their weight to see to their residents' needs.

Newhaven Court at Clearview

Joe & Tonya Lucas, Family Members
